<h3 id="X31454">X(31454) = CENTROID OF CURVATURES OF THESE CIRCLES: {CIRCUMCIRCLE, 2nd LEMOINE, STEINER}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 3*a^4-6*S*a^2-4*(b^2+c^2)*a^2+(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :
<p>X(31454) lies on these lines:

<p>
X(31454) = midpoint of X(6453) and X(8960)<br>
X(31454) = {X(i), X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (371, 590, 3071), (371, 8981, 590), (6425, 13846, 4)<br>
